page.title: 28HEALTH AND WELFARE
page.content: There are no doctor's surgeries in either Spratton or Holdenby. There are two surgeries in the local area, one in Brixworth and the other in Guilsborough that provide services for both Spratton and Holdenby. The Guilsborough surgery has a pharmacist attached to it and a Co-op pharmacist is situated in Brixworth. Elderly residents can take advantage of a delivery service and have their prescriptions delivered to the local garage for them to collect.
